roleset.name: beleive (uncertainly) something, speculate
roleset.note: CONJECTURE-V NOTES: Frame created by Arrick (from conjecture.01-v)

example.name: conjecture an SBAR
example.text: Some conjectured that the king may have had tattoos above his eyes, other wondered whether he perhaps had big bulging eyes, and still others put forward the hypothesis that zongmu was simply a figure of speech.
example.arg: that the king may have had tattoos above his eyes
